urls.title: Baggage allowance | Information | British Airways
urls.description: Find out everything you need to know about your checked baggage allowance on British Airways flights, from how many bags you can take to bag weight limits.

data.text: @Shounakb06 Hi Shounak. Each checked baggage can weigh up to 23kg. Any baggage that weighs between 23kg and 32kg, will incur a heavy bag charge at the airport. Bags over 32kg won’t be accepted as checked baggage. Please visit https://t.co/5Ug0wCzHrl for more information. Liz

urls.title: Flight cancellation compensation | Legal | British Airways
urls.description: EU regulation has been put in place to ensure that there are common rules around compensation for passengers who have been affected by cancellations or other flight disruption. Find out more about your entitlements and how to claim compensation, a refund or reimbursement.
